thread.title: BRIEF-Mountain Province Diamonds Signs non-binding MOU with De Beers regarding Kennady Diamonds Resources

title: BRIEF-Mountain Province Diamonds Signs non-binding MOU with De Beers regarding Kennady Diamonds Resources
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:03 AM / in 2 hours BRIEF-Mountain Province Diamonds Signs non-binding MOU with De Beers regarding Kennady Diamonds Resources Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Mountain Province Diamonds Inc : * MOUNTAIN PROVINCE DIAMONDS SIGNS NON-BINDING MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING WITH DE BEERS REGARDING KENNADY DIAMONDS RESOURCES * MOUNTAIN PROVINCE DIAMONDS-MOU CONTEMPLATES INCORPORATING PROPERTIES OWNED BY KENNADY DIAMONDS INC INTO GAHCHO KUÉ JOINT VENTURE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
